name: The Sepulturero tales
description:
as a initiate of the clan sepulturero, our hero must investigate some problems ocurred in some villages
no one could predict the adventure to come...

Sepulturero tale´s is a videogame, combinig the usual rpg misions with survival elements, in a forest full of ghosts and others aberrations.
in this prototipe, your only weapon will be the light of your torch, be wise using the oil for it, complete the 5 initial missions to complete it.
